title: @JavaPolis
body: I had a great day at JavaPolis. Congratulations to Stephan Janssen, the Belgian Java Users Group, and everyone else involved: you all did a great job. It really was packed. The venue was a total mob scene. After my talk I did a Q&A session, which is one of my favorite things to do. The audience asked great questions. After that, my day was mostly filled with talking to the press. The day ended with an entertaining panel session that was far too short. It was just getting interesting when we ran out of time...
